casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan E. BRUNSON 247P16-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Jonathan Eugene Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan Eugene. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

*176The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of October 2018 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
